name: Grotesquest: Act I
description:
Grotesquest is a 3rd person action game with devious dungeons bursting with vile creatures and priceless loot for any benevolent adventurer to claim!

  • Mix of randomly generated dungeons and handcrafted levels
  • Roster of different weapons and shields with randomized stats
  • Exquisite relics that grant you passive bonuses
  • Gain XP to level up and grow stronger
  • Unlock new cosmetic options
  • Compete in online leaderboards to reach the hall of fame
  • Beat the Time Attack and Ultra Hard bonus modes for extra challenge
  • Fill out your compendium of foes and equipment

Design, graphics, programming, levels, music & everything: MobyDeee
Sound effects: Epic Stock MediaLeaderboard powered by: Epic Leaderboard

What did you think? Leave a comment, discuss and rate!
